description: Hercules fighting Achelous; a landscape with two men wrestling; Hercules standing looking up, Achelous bent over in front of him
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription 

in image bottom center in black: Ægid Rousselet sculp | below image in black in two columns:Combat d\'Hercule et d\'Achelous / Gravé sur le tableau du Guide qui est au cabinet du Roy/ de 8 pieds de hault et 6 pieds de large / Hercules cum acheloo certamen. / aeri incisu ex tabula Guidi asseruata in Pinacotheca Regia / 8 pedes alta 6 lata | on sheet in pencil: 2-329
title: Battle between Hercules and Achelous
